p: Illumina short-read sequences were mapped to the SL1344 reference genome and annotated using PROKKA and then analysed in a pairwise fashion against SL1344 using delta-bit-score (DBS), a profile hidden Markov model based approach [ 33] with Pfam hidden Markov Models (HMMs) [ 112]. The mean DBS per genome and percentage of genes with mutations in Pfam domains (non-zero DBS) are reported.
